attributes.action: have all charged paedophiles castrated to help fight increasing numbers of rapists and paedophiles on the streets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To help combat paedophilia and sexual assault, drastic action needs to be taken! Brown and co. need to get their act together and castrate all convicted paedophiles/rapist to avoid repeat offence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
